typeDescriptions.typeString: function (struct ChainStateLib.ChainState storage pointer,struct CommitmentHeaderLib.CommitmentHeaderQuery memory) view returns (bool)
literal_string "Block not recognized or transaction out of range."

arguments.value: Block not recognized or transaction out of range.

typeDescriptions.typeString: function (struct ChallengeLib.BlockChallengeState storage pointer,uint256) view returns (struct ChallengeLib.Challenge memory)
function (struct ChallengeLib.BlockChallengeState storage pointer,uint256) view returns (struct ChallengeLib.Challenge memory)

documentation.text:
@dev Reclaim the bond from a challenge to a block
 which was reverted in a way that did not reward the challenger.
 This can occur if a challenge to the block succeeds without referencing
 the message witness from the challenge.

typeDescriptions.typeString: function (struct ChainStateLib.ChainState storage pointer,struct CommitmentHeaderLib.CommitmentHeaderQuery memory) view returns (bool)
literal_string "Block not recognized or transaction out of range."

arguments.value: Block not recognized or transaction out of range.

typeDescriptions.typeString: function (struct ChallengeLib.BlockChallengeState storage pointer,uint256) view returns (struct ChallengeLib.Challenge memory)
function (struct ChallengeLib.BlockChallengeState storage pointer,uint256) view returns (struct ChallengeLib.Challenge memory)

documentation.text:
@dev Reclaim the bond from a challenge to a block
 which was reverted in a way that did not reward the challenger.
 This can occur if a challenge to the block succeeds without referencing
 the message witness from the challenge.

ChallengeTimeout(bytes32,uint256,uint8).details: Emitted when a challenge is closed because one of the two parties failed to respond to a challenge step.

params.step: Indicates which step the challenge was on when it timed out.

challengeTransaction((bytes32,uint256,ui.details: Challenges the block producer of a given block to submit a message witness for the transaction. The challenged block must be a pending block in the chain state, and the challenged transaction must not have already been challenged.

params.query: block query for the block being challenged
params.transactionIndex: index of the transaction to challenge

reclaimChallengeBond(bytes32,uint256).details: Reclaim the bond from a challenge to a block which was reverted in a way that did not reward the challenger. This can occur if a challenge to the block succeeds without referencing the message witness from the challenge.

challengeTransaction((bytes32,uint256,ui.notice: Must be submitted with the requisite challenge bond.
